title: title attribute
description: The title attribute should be avoided due to poor support.

references.title: WHATWG HTML spec for the th element

assertions.title: contribute to the accessible name when no other method is used to name the element
assertions.rationale: A user needs to understand the purpose of the element.

assertions.title: contribute to the description when the element is already named
assertions.rationale: A user needs to be aware of the further information provided by the tooltip.

assertions.title: display the value
assertions.rationale: Users need to be aware of the content of the tooltip.
